N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 43.4 - Required lighting of vehicles less than 80 inches in width

State Regulations

Vehicles less than 80 inches in width shall be equipped in
accordance with table III. Table III-Required Motor Vehicle Lighting Equipment

For All Vehicles Less Than 80 Inches Overall Width

Item

Passenger vehicles, trucks and
buses

Trailers****
Headlamps

Either 2 white headlamps with high and low beams or 4
white headlamps, 2 with just high beams and 2 with just low beams. None

Tail lamps
2 red
2 red

Stop lamps
2 red
2 red

Number plate lamp
1 white
1 white

Parking lamps
2 amber or white

None

Reflex reflectors
4 red; 2 amber*
4 red; 2 amber***
Intermediate side reflex reflectors
2 amber**
2 amber**
Intermediate side marker lamps
2 amber**
2 amber**
Side marker lamps
2 red; 2 amber*
2 red; 2 amber

Backup lamp
1 white

None

Turn""signal lamps
2 class A red or amber; 2 class A amber
2 class A red or amber

Turn""signal operating unit
1

None

Vehicular hazard warning signal operating unit
1***
None
*
A tractor need not be equipped
with any rear side marker devices, rear clearance lamps or rear identification
lamps. **
Intermediate side marker
devices are not required on vehicles less than 30 feet in overall
length. ***
1965 and earlier model
vehicles may substitute two class A or class B amber reflectors for front
highway hazard warning lamps. ****
Trailers less than 30
inches wide need only one tall lamp, stop lamp, reflex reflector and number
plate lamp. No other lamps or reflectors are required. Notes
